Seek immortality and the Yellow Sprout,
Yet first obtain the True Lead’s Flower—
Only that which forms of itself
May be wrought into Golden Sand.
Refine it once more, ingest a single grain,
And soar through space into the azure clouds,
Roaming beyond heaven and earth,
Where every place is home to immortals.

**Oral Instructions of Master Yinxizhen, Twelfth**

The supreme medicine must employ lead,
Gathered in a cup toward the dark.
If you would know the Yellow Sprout,
First inquire of the Yin Earth.
True Lead matches the Kan Man,
With Wu and Ji attending—
This alone is called Yellow Alum,
The very ancestor of Returned Elixir.

**Oral Instructions of Master Taozhizhen, Thirteenth**

True Mercury is not quicksilver,
Yet from this it is obtained.
If you seek true quicksilver,
First seek the power within Kan.
Another instruction says:
Within the errant, one true Yang resides,
The child of Water, belonging to the West.

**Oral Instructions of Master Xuanguang, Fourteenth**

The art of nurturing life
Is neither difficult nor easy.
The world uses lead,
Yet fails to cultivate the will of lead.
Scarcely has it shed its black robe
When its pure essence is revealed.
Upon the ash pool’s blazing fire,
The knife’s edge follows the law.
Lead’s hundredfold return is the same—
When drawn, take care not to lose it.
Hold it through the Crimson Gate,
And at the touch, it hardens like stone.
The medicine employs True Water Essence,
Eight as the foremost number.
Wondrous essence, too, is eight ounces,
Issuing from the Yang person’s body.
When the two blend in harmony,
The Rice Mountain must be kept secret.
Upon the Black Dragon’s curve,
When the count reaches one ounce of True Dragon Brain,
It must be rich and unctuous.
White is the True Dragon Brain,
Gray is not.
Used at the appointed time,
The two substances unite as one.
The Great Returned Elixir’s reflection
Requires discernment in its preparation—
Take care to use a vessel of true gold.
Should one grasp these words,
Earthly immortality is but this.
If misapplied,
Calamity will descend in an instant.
Ten years of obscured sunlight,
Five years without seeing light—
Yet if a single grain is transmuted,
In an instant, one attains sagehood.

**Song:**
*The Cantong Qi* and *Jinbi* conceal their secrets,
Yet the Yin Lord’s preface clarifies the steps.
Should the adept encounter the Pure Clouds’ instructions,
From this, Dragon and Tiger recognize their true form.

Heaven’s primordial qi arises from emptiness,
The rosy-cheeked elder’s body like suet.
Within fire, the body transforms—still within fire,
The immortal, content, is called the Mystic Pearl.

The world knows softness but not hardness,
Claiming the Yellow Sprout bears a yellow hue.
Only when one reaches the realm of Cup and Lead
Do they realize the Yellow Sprout is not yellow.

**Oral Instructions of Master Erzhu Ao, Fifteenth**

Heaven set, earth established, the primordial chaos divided,
Creation’s blossoms burn everywhere.
One Yin, one Yang—thus the Dao is formed,
Autumn Stone, pale, begets descendants.
Xuanwu and Zhuque illuminate the path ahead,
The True Mercury of Yongquan guards the cosmos.
In the crucible, lead is refined into treasure,
The Old Woman hides her head and refuses to emerge.
Within the twelve gourds, the Purple River Cart,
The forty-two breaths blaze in the immortal’s cave.
Complexion like jade, visage like frost,
The date leaf’s crimson, polished to perfection.
Seizing sun and moon, they enter the furnace,
Flaming, radiant—yet the soul remains unlost.
If not to relieve the world’s hunger, cold, and sickness,
Better to hasten and depart to study the Dao.

Boil the White Tiger’s form in dark waters,
The Beast’s furnace, above and below, unfathomable.
The Great Image does not wander in the rabbit’s burrow,
Great awakening is not bound by petty details.
The deluded, their hearts astray, all lose the way—
Not passed down to the blind of the lower realm,
Lest they bring ruin to clan and self.

Six praises, six laments—
Erzhu Ao has departed for Penglai,
Ascending as an immortal in broad daylight, an ancient secret.
The crane calls ahead at Dongting Lake,
I pay homage to my sacred ancestor, who preserved the art.
Departing, the primal sound sweet as honey,
One seven, two sevens, seventy thousand complete.
Opening the furnace, suddenly a ball of fire appears,
Radiant, blazing, resplendent.
Though not to relieve the world’s hunger, cold, and sickness,
Better to seek the Dao and dwell in the Golden Chamber.

**Oral Instructions of Master Chongxu, Sixteenth**

I sigh in envy of the mighty river’s moonlit shadow,
The lord of gold arises, revealing the heart of lead.
One must strive to seek the immortal’s formula,
Lest the years and months slip by in vain.

**Another Song:**
Ninefold refinement of lead’s essence completes the Great Dao,
Why should my family fear not attaining long life?
At dawn, I seek Nongyu to pass through the immortal’s palace,
At dusk, I visit Magu to enter the Great Clarity.
The divine illumination originally stems from the numinous qi,
Yet Emperor Wu of Han knew only worldly passions.
All things now are but emptiness and silence,
A lifetime adrift, leaving only a floating name.

**Oral Instructions of Master Dong the Immortal, Seventeenth**

The sun’s soul and moon’s spirit, formless,
Gathered in their natural, pristine state.
Their union with immortals is truly beyond discourse,
Rising to the clouds above the Yellow Sprout.
Dragon soars, Tiger leaps—transforming the Golden Field,
From beginning to end, one must obtain the lead of transcendence.
To build a home, to dwell naturally,
At the moment of pairing, it is instantly known.
Recognizing the parting from the womb, one longs to speak,
Yet it lies not in written texts or oral instructions.

**Oral Instructions of Master Yuanyang, Eighteenth**

*The Returned Elixir Chapter*, *The Returned Elixir Chapter*—
To obtain the Yellow Sprout, first ignite the lead.
Yang Ren does not flee in fire,
How can Yin Bing be wrought?
The hen incubates the egg until the days are complete,
The mother bears the child after ten months.
If only Kun comes to serve as dwelling,
Why fear Kun will not act?
My method lies before your eyes—
Defy it, and you’ll wander for ten thousand kalpas.
The Eight Stones must flee in fire,
Do not play with water and waste your efforts.
The Returned Elixir is not difficult for the world to learn,
It is only that people of this age lack the will.
Should you understand Master Wei’s ten laments,
A thousand turns of seawater will transform into mulberry fields.

**Oral Instructions of Master Luo Gongyuan, Nineteenth**

The world does not know the elixir possesses spirit,
Yet if one tests wolfsbane, it will surely harm.
Knowing the world holds both good and evil,
Why not draw near to good neighbors?
Nüwa refined the Five Constants’ qi,
Transforming and shaping it to mend heaven and earth.
Thirty-six strategies the world knows,
Seventy-two stones arrayed in their places.
Heaven attains the One and thus endures,
Earth attains the One and thus abides.
Metal, refined by fire, becomes essence,
Wood, turned to charcoal, does not decay.

chunks.original_text: 故知唯炼唯精，大还如何不有？ 凝我神定我心，志精可以成黄金，河车本向铅中取，姥女还须汞裹寻。 傍思之物馒周彰，太一出水入公量，淮南调鼎彭祖山市变牢性记去香盐密尝，得道同归不死乡。 文一武莫疏失，釜下唯铺绿海，炉中少用搏桑日。 赫奕鱼鳞透目光，须同魏伯云中莫学姐娥月裹藏。 邓都落名天府地下阴官大怖畏，兵刃水火不能，何但虫蛇兼虎兕。 亭亭金骨皆坚，郁郁绿身褊绿毛，曾观东海几回，数度曾偷王母桃，驱策雷公使神鬼千年少别辽东水。 固济精研须缄紫烟碧焰喷人。 乘龙驾鹤倾城，七日应归维氏道是易亦大难，青龙白虎自相盘，阴车湿阳车乾，夫妻相对卦中安，四方末住沾颜色，五个王侯尽罢官。 抱朴子口诀第二十 朱砂水银入华池，收得黄芽人不知，本是仙人留口诀，世上喧喧乱言说。 七十年中付一人，分付还须有仙骨，一一事须手眼传，采取只在片时问。 河车覆在丹田裹，制伏只在黄芽边。 质毂子口诀第二十－ 铅若是真，不失家臣，铅若不真，其汞难亲。 杨玄－口诀第二十二 世上人人尽好药，个个元来寻不着，也道用铅不用铅，及至用铅还是错。 用铅不用铅，不用得长年，用铅须用铅，用铅住丹田。 无铅不成丹，还丹生在铅。 金公能住水。 黑铅有黄芽，黄芽入汞家，覆载以河车。 歌曰 铅向铅中出，铅同色不同，若能分皂白，日日是仙翁。 僧若讷口诀第二十三 黄芽砂汞造，阴壳含阳花，不得黄芽理，还丹应路赊。 世人炼至药，尽认铅黄花，黄花是死物，那得到仙家。 黄芽非外药，内象取精华，若到黄芽地，金银徒尔夸。 歌曰 芽若是铅，去铅万里，芽若非铅，从铅而始。 铅为芽母，芽为铅子，既得金花，舍铅不使。 张华真人歌铅汞第二十四 赤龙化为粉，白虎利如霜，其中投石液，还要帝流浆。 调神清五脏，欲得炼三光，专守坚冰性，如何阴使阳。 二味口诀 虎伏龙亦藏，龙潜先伏虎，但毕河车功，不用堤防虑。 黄老学飞仙，狂迷不得路，回首指牝鹦，不测阴阳数。 却坐太一宫，参商方始遇，左右得近神，四相皆扶护。 乾坤法象成，自有仙人顾。 剑州张司马口诀第二十五 九九之中乾体开，华池金液自徘徊，阴阳鼎上先光彩，铅花炉裹考三才。 即知造化由人手，术正药真神自来，到此修时应出世，四时不用苦相催。 评曰 其色光辉耀日月，无穷改变不思议，但住铅砂成宝后，歇头一任丙丁吹。 函谷关老君铅汞歌第二十六 红铅黑铅大丹头，红铅黑铅体同，黑金取精赤取髓，解用赤黑药无用赤入黑保长生，用黑入赤天仙大还丹照鉴矣。 颠倒两法总称铅，黑能变化赤天仙。 至道之人莫容易，贪财好色不须传，函谷关头梁石山，老君镌石留此言。 岑真人口诀第二十七 天生太素，地产灵津，能伏能飞，变化如神。 阴阳宗祖，道契君臣，圣人秘宝，非者不闻。 且太素为君，灵津为臣，合和两性，呼吸相吞。 为夫为妇，男女姻亲，变化钩牵，恩爱传真。 歌曰 东方青龙，丙丁甲乙，西方白虎，壬癸凝液。 二气含真，世人难觅，机持此宝，一水一石。 灰池焰烁，名除死籍。 传付心诀再歌 水神投金碧，乾坤日月精，坎离为既济，三才显其名。 阳数居阴杀，阴数归阳刑，欲知颠倒术，相克是相生。

Thus know: only through refinement and essence,
How could the Great Return not be attained?
Condense my spirit, settle my heart,
With focused intent, one may transmute to gold.
The River Chariot is drawn from lead,
The Crone’s Daughter must be sought within mercury.

Adjunct substances circulate widely,
The Great One emerges from water into the public measure.
Huainan stirred the cauldron, Pengzu’s mountain market altered the nature of sacrificial beasts,
Records of departed fragrance and secret-tasted salt.
Attaining the Dao, they converge in the land of no death.

Civil and martial arts must not be neglected,
Beneath the crucible, only spread the green sea,
Within the furnace, use less of the mulberry’s sun.

Resplendent as fish scales piercing the eye’s light,
One must follow Wei Bo in the clouds,
Not learn from Chang’e’s concealment in the moon.

Dengdu’s name falls to the celestial treasury, the earthly underworld’s yin officials greatly fear,
Blades, water, and fire cannot harm,
How much less insects, snakes, tigers, and rhinos?
Towering, the golden bones all harden,
Lush, the green body with its verdant fur.
Once observed the Eastern Sea’s many turns,
Several times stolen the Queen Mother’s peaches,
Commanding the Thunder Duke, dispatching spirits and ghosts,
A thousand years but a brief parting from Liaodong’s waters.

Firmly seal and refine, must bind with purple smoke and jade-green flames that spout upon men.

Riding dragons, mounting cranes, captivating cities,
In seven days, one should return to the Way of the Viscount of Wei.
This is easy yet profoundly difficult.
Green Dragon and White Tiger coil of themselves,
The yin chariot is damp, the yang chariot dry.
Husband and wife face each other, settled within the hexagram,
The four directions’ ends stain with color,
Five kings and marquises all resign their offices.

**Oral Instructions of Master Baopuzi, Twentieth**

Cinnabar and mercury enter the Flowery Pool,
The Yellow Sprout is gathered, yet none know.
This is the oral instruction left by immortals,
The world clamors with confused words.
For seventy years, entrusted to one person,
Bestowed only upon those with immortal bones.
Each matter must be transmitted hand to eye,
Gathering occurs in but a moment’s time.
The River Chariot rests within the Cinnabar Field,
Subdued only at the Yellow Sprout’s side.

**Oral Instructions of Master Zhiguzi, Twenty-First**

If lead is true,
It does not lose its household minister.
If lead is not true,
Its mercury will be hard to approach.

**Oral Instructions of Master Yang Xuan, Twenty-Second**

In the world, everyone seeks the medicine,
Yet each originally fails to find it.
Some say use lead, some say do not,
But when it comes to using lead, it is still wrong.
Use lead, do not use lead,
Not using it grants long years.
Use lead, must use lead,
Using lead, reside in the Cinnabar Field.
Without lead, the elixir does not form,
The Returned Elixir is born in lead.
The Metal Duke can restrain water.
Black lead contains the Yellow Sprout,
The Yellow Sprout enters mercury’s house,
Covered and borne by the River Chariot.

**Song:**
Lead emerges from within lead,
Lead of the same color yet not the same.
If one can distinguish black and white,
Each day is a celestial elder.

**Oral Instructions of Monk Ruonè, Twenty-Third**

The Yellow Sprout, cinnabar, and mercury concoct,
The yin husk contains the yang flower.
Without grasping the Yellow Sprout’s principle,
The Returned Elixir’s path remains distant.
People of the world refine the medicine to its utmost,
All recognize lead’s yellow flower.
The yellow flower is a dead thing,
How can it reach the immortals’ realm?
The Yellow Sprout is not an external medicine,
The inner image extracts its essence.
When reaching the Yellow Sprout’s ground,
Gold and silver are but vain boasts.

**Song:**
If the sprout is lead,
Depart from lead by ten thousand miles.
If the sprout is not lead,
Begin from lead.
Lead is the sprout’s mother,
The sprout is lead’s child.
Having obtained the golden flower,
Abandon lead and do not employ it.

**Zhang Hua the Perfected’s Song of Lead and Mercury, Twenty-Fourth**

The Red Dragon transforms into powder,
The White Tiger sharp as frost.
Within, cast the stone’s liquid,
Still requiring the Emperor’s Flowing Sauce.
Regulate the spirit, purify the five viscera,
Desiring to refine the Three Lights.
Firmly guard the nature of solid ice,
How can yin employ yang?

**Oral Instructions on the Two Flavors**

The tiger crouches, the dragon also hides,
The dragon first lurks, then subdues the tiger.
Simply complete the River Chariot’s work,
No need for embankments or defensive concerns.
The Yellow Elder studied flying immortality,
Madly deluded, unable to find the path.
Turning back, he pointed to the female phoenix,
Unfathomable are yin and yang’s numbers.
Yet sitting in the Great One’s palace,
Only then do Shen and Shang meet.
Left and right, drawing near the spirits,
The four phases all support and protect.
Heaven and earth’s model is complete,
Naturally, immortals will attend.

**Oral Instructions of the Prefectural Judge of Jianzhou, Twenty-Fifth**

Within the nine nines, the Qian body opens,
The Flowery Pool’s golden liquid naturally lingers.
Upon the yin-yang crucible, first appears radiance,
Within the lead-flower furnace, the Three Powers are tested.
Then know creation lies in human hands,
With proper technique and true medicine, spirits come of themselves.
At this stage of cultivation, one should transcend the world,
The four seasons need not bitterly urge.

**Critique:**
Its color shines brilliantly, illuminating sun and moon,
Endless transformations, beyond thought.
But once lead and cinnabar become treasure,
Cease the firing, freely let bing and ding blow.

**Laozi’s Song of Lead and Mercury from Hangu Pass, Twenty-Sixth**

Red lead, black lead, the Great Elixir’s head,
Red lead, black lead, their bodies the same.
Black metal extracts essence, red extracts marrow,
Understanding the use of red and black: medicine without red enters black to preserve long life,
Using black to enter red, celestial immortals achieve the Great Returned Elixir, its reflection clear.
The two inverted methods are both called lead,
Black can transform into red celestial immortals.
Those of the utmost Dao must not be careless,
Greed for wealth and lust for beauty need not be transmitted.
At the head of Hangu Pass, Liangshi Mountain,
Laozi carved these words into stone.

**Oral Instructions of Master Cen Zhenren, Twenty-Seventh**

Heaven generates the Great Simplicity,
Earth produces numinous essence.
Able to subdue, able to fly,
Transforming like spirits.
Yin and yang’s ancestral founder,
The Dao accords with ruler and minister.
The sage’s secret treasure,
Not heard by the unworthy.
Moreover, the Great Simplicity is the ruler,
Numinous essence the minister.
Harmonizing the two natures,
Inhaling and exhaling, they swallow each other.
As husband and wife,
Male and female in marital kinship,
Transforming, hooking, and pulling,
Love transmits the truth.

**Song:**
Eastern Green Dragon,
Bing, ding, jia, yi.
Western White Tiger,
Ren and gui congeal the liquid.
The two qi contain the true,
Hard for the world to find.
Grasping this treasure,
One water, one stone.
The ash pool’s flames blaze,
Removing names from death’s register.

**Transmitted Heart Instructions, Another Song**

The water spirit casts into golden jade,
Heaven and earth’s sun and moon essence.
Kan and Li achieve completion,
The Three Powers display their names.
Yang numbers reside in yin’s execution,
Yin numbers return to yang’s punishment.
Desiring to know the inverted technique,
Mutual overcoming is mutual generation.

chunks.original_text: 若修诸八石，千万无一成，欲觅真道者，壬癸上寻庚。 崔玄真岷山子口诀第二十八 岷山宝室九仙居，日月萦回洞底虚，为有真人常镇此，玉留盘结气长舒。 曾游海娇昆丘客，远控龙骈亦探迹，炼得华九转成，中有白银相报积。 月中玉兔坎中阳，外柔形容内有刚，二象雄雌同一体，还如金向水中藏。 金水相合是魂魄，三才变异诚难测，倏然龙虎两交并，化得龙儿在杳冥。 状似凝酥黄芽雪，亦如玄圃玉华结，本非世上起机心，元是真人留秘诀。 留秘诀不参差，晃山石室有丹砂，至道之人依此法，飞取青龙作一家。 季魂周天成气质，重与水银相固密，似子还婚小女儿，苏张下说情难失。 相传此物是黄芽，重重金鼎贮金华，制成雄黄偃药砂，六一缄封须秘密，莫教神室有纤瑕。 火候初从一阳起，乾坤两卦成终始，文经武纬启灵机，一法先王传秘旨。 蟾蛛天上尽还生，丹鼎开时见道情，每度恢奇别起象，璘编红紫状难名。 却取金合雄作匮，世光流尽赤龙飞，烧金学道岷山子，亲得真人受玄旨。 玄旨唯论汞与铅，修得黄芽身不死，炼丹炼志兼炼神，不营名利显清芬。 逃名远去尘埃外，栖托空闲契上。 莫学人寰嚣薄士，役役终身爱名，虽然有意慕桩年，未免将身在朝市。 窦真君七返砂歌第二十九 金公年六十，六十金公老，妮女年六十，六十姥女少。 金公年三十，姥女还渐少，老翁得少妻，枯杨自生筱。 夫妻同一处，成道和合了。 根本是黄芽，金公元一家，姥女入铅室，须臾地变荼。 覆月合仰月，仰月急须赊，固济重固济，固济似丹家。 丙丁张下诐，混沌自甜葩，七八阳数极，九六更须加。 四壳阳既满，五色似朝霞。 去阳除覆月，上上好黄芽，黄即黄金色，白即白马牙，变化成运载，故号曰河车。 玄明与滨伏，夫妇同一家，本是王阳术，黄帝美金花。 智者．能隐秘，愚者向人夸，若达此道者，鹤控白云涯。 汉祖天师口诀第三十 铅抽髓髓抽精，精髓相合丹必成，一斤水银十七两，一两变化是铅精。 将此铅精作大丹，老子九转入生研，一两水银特牛力，服之令人貌若仙。 貌若仙兮筋骨坚，筋骨坚强返枯槁，截舌人问不须道，未能隐显出没藏。 切须慎口莫颠狂，若教上界天神怒，恐遭非横及刀光。 果州谢自然口诀第三十－ 白女正当年十六，自夸弱质颜如玉，常嗟岁月无良媒，昼夜孤单唯独宿。 爷娘不审他心意，馒说张三并李四，几度为话总不成，教人羞天复愧地。 忽遇黄婆来扣门，说道金公体性温，遂将二命问君平，君平断言此好婚。 不偏不曲合乾坤，审此因绿甚宜良，至今子孙满帝乡。 昔时不因黄婆力，如何得契合阴阳。 曹真人口诀第三十二 捉取东青龙，配与西白虎，更将南朱雀，会偶北玄武。 四者穷其根，本来同宗祖。 世人不知探，众石多错侯，不解演阴阳，配合为夫妇。 阴阳气本双，始得俱相聚，就中最妙者，须得中央土。 泥炉不假法，运火心须苦，一日两卦候，进退依节度，细穷日月盈，莫遣失风雨。 十月还丹成，身除贫病苦，沧海与桑田，变时君始睹。 谁人得吾道，不得轻取与，容易泄天机，谪罚殃七祖。 太白山隐士韩蕴中口诀第三十三 夫大道弘远，阴阳难穷，造化发生，世人莫测。 妄谈虚而白首千万，耗财比延命，而驻颜返伤残而短寿。

If one refines the various Eight Minerals,
A thousand, ten thousand—none will succeed.
Those who seek the true Dao
Must seek *geng* upon *ren* and *gui*.

**Cui Xuanzhen’s Minshanzi Oral Instructions, Twenty-Eighth**

The Minshan treasure-chamber, abode of the Nine Immortals,
Sun and moon coil within its hollow depths.
For true persons ever guard this place,
Jade remains coiled, *qi* endlessly at ease.

Once a traveler to Haijiao and Kunqiu,
Far controlling dragon teams, he traced their tracks.
Refining, he achieved the Ninefold Transformation of *hua*,
Within, white silver amassed in recompense.

The jade hare of the moon, the yang within *kan*,
Outwardly yielding in form, inwardly firm.
The two images—male and female—share one body,
Just as gold hides within water.

Gold and water unite as *hun* and *po*,
The Three Powers transform, truly unfathomable.
Suddenly, dragon and tiger intertwine,
Giving birth to the dragon-child in the unseen.

Its form resembles congealed butter, the yellow sprout of snow,
Or the jade blossoms of Xuanpu.
Not born of worldly scheming,
But the secret instructions left by true persons.

Leave no flaw in these secret instructions,
For in the crystal mountain’s stone chamber lies cinnabar.
Those who attain the supreme Dao follow this method,
And fly to take the Green Dragon as their kin.

*Ji-hun* completes the celestial circuit, forming *qi*-substance,
Once more conjoined with mercury, firmly sealed.
Like a son returning to wed the young maiden,
Or Su Qin and Zhang Yi’s persuasions—love cannot be lost.

This thing passed down is the yellow sprout,
Layer upon layer, the golden crucible holds golden blossoms.
Refined into realgar, the reclining elixir-sand,
Sealed with the Six-One method, it must be kept secret.
Let no flaw mar the divine chamber.

The fire-timing begins with the first yang,
*Qian* and *kun* form its beginning and end.
Civil warp and martial weft awaken the numinous mechanism,
One method—the secret decree of the former kings.

Heavenly toads and spiders all revive,
When the elixir crucible opens, the Dao’s nature is revealed.
Each cycle brings wondrous transformations, new forms arise,
Their radiance—crimson, purple—defies description.

Then take the golden vessel, use mercury as the repository,
When the world’s light is exhausted, the Red Dragon flies.
Burning gold, the Minshan adept learns the Dao,
Receiving the true person’s mysterious decree.

The mysterious decree speaks only of mercury and lead,
Refining the yellow sprout, the body does not die.
Refine the elixir, refine the will, refine the spirit,
Do not pursue fame or profit—manifest pure fragrance.

Flee fame, withdraw beyond the dust,
Dwell in quietude, attune to the highest.
Do not imitate the world’s clamorous, shallow men,
Who toil their whole lives for renown.
Though they yearn for long life,
They cannot escape the marketplace.

**Dou Zhenjun’s "Seven-Returned Sand" Song, Twenty-Ninth**

The Metal Duke is sixty,
At sixty, the Metal Duke is old.
The Maiden is sixty,
At sixty, the young maiden is young.

The Metal Duke is thirty,
The Maiden grows ever younger.
The old man gains a young wife,
The withered willow sprouts fresh shoots.

Husband and wife in one place,
Complete the Dao in harmonious union.

The root is the yellow sprout,
The Metal Duke’s primal family.
The Maiden enters the lead chamber,
In an instant, the earth transforms to cinnabar.

The inverted moon joins the upright moon,
The upright moon must be swiftly secured.
Seal firmly, seal again,
Sealing like the elixir family.

*Bing* and *ding* spread below,
Chaos itself turns sweet and fragrant.
Seven and eight—yang numbers reach their peak,
Nine and six must be added again.

The four shells—yang now full,
Five colors like the dawn’s glow.
Remove the yang, discard the inverted moon,
Above, the finest yellow sprout.
Yellow is the color of gold,
White is the white horse’s tooth.
Transforming, it becomes the conveyance,
Thus called the River Chariot.

Mysterious brightness and hidden submission,
Husband and wife share one home.
This is the King Yang’s technique,
The Yellow Emperor’s golden blossom.

The wise conceal it,
Fools boast of it to others.
Those who grasp this Dao
Ride cranes to the white clouds’ edge.

**Han Zu’s Celestial Master Oral Instructions, Thirtieth**

Lead draws out marrow, marrow draws out essence,
Essence and marrow unite—the elixir must form.
One catty of mercury, seventeen taels,
One tael transforms into lead’s essence.

Use this lead-essence to make the great elixir,
Laozi’s Ninefold Refinement enters life’s mortar.
One tael of mercury has an ox’s strength,
Consuming it, one’s appearance becomes immortal.

An immortal’s appearance—sinews and bones firm,
Sinews and bones strong, reversing withering.
Cut out the tongue if asked—no need to speak,
Unable to conceal or reveal, appear or hide.

Guard your words, do not act madly,
Lest the celestial gods above grow angry,
And bring misfortune or the blade’s gleam.

**Guo Zixian of Guozhou’s Oral Instructions, Thirty-First**

The White Maiden, just sixteen,
Boasts a delicate frame, a jade-like face.
Ever sighing at the months without a good matchmaker,
Day and night alone, she sleeps by herself.

Her parents do not understand her heart,
Casually speaking of Zhang San or Li Si.
Several times the talks come to nothing,
Making her ashamed to heaven, ashamed to earth.

Suddenly, the Yellow Crone comes knocking,
Saying the Metal Duke’s nature is gentle.
She takes their two fates to consult Junping,
Junping declares this a fine match.

Neither biased nor crooked, it accords with heaven and earth,
Examining the cause, it is most fitting.
To this day, their descendants fill the imperial realm.
Were it not for the Yellow Crone’s efforts,
How could yin and yang have united?

**Cao Zhenren’s Oral Instructions, Thirty-Second**

Seize the Eastern Green Dragon,
Pair it with the Western White Tiger.
Then take the Southern Vermilion Bird,
Match it with the Northern Dark Warrior.

Trace these four to their root,
Originally of the same ancestral clan.
Yet people do not know to explore this,
Mistaking many stones for the marquis.
They do not understand how to unfold yin and yang,
To pair them as husband and wife.

Yin and yang’s *qi* are inherently dual,
Only then can they unite.
Of these, the most wondrous
Is the Central Earth.

The clay furnace needs no artifice,
But the fire’s management requires diligence.
Each day, two hexagrams’ timing,
Advance and retreat follow the measure.
Exhaustively study the moon’s waxing,
Lest wind and rain be lost.

After ten months, the returned elixir is complete,
The body freed from poverty and suffering.
When the blue sea turns mulberry fields,
You will witness the change.

Whoever obtains my Dao,
Must not lightly pass it on.
To casually reveal heaven’s mechanism
Brings calamity upon seven generations.

**Han Yunzhong, Recluse of Mount Taibai, Oral Instructions, Thirty-Third**

The great Dao is vast and distant,
Yin and yang are hard to fathom.
Creation and transformation arise,
Yet people cannot comprehend them.

Vainly discussing emptiness, they white their hair by the thousands,
Wasting wealth to prolong life,
Yet preserving their complexion brings injury and ruin, shortening their years.

Those of past and present who pursue this Way have met ruin in droves, their eyes straying from true teaching, their minds unclear on the essential aim. They call mercury yin and the Four Yellows yang, cast crude lead into the mix, and gather flowers as earth—herbs and trees they name dragon and tiger. Common gold and silver they pair as mother and child, refining elixirs and consuming them, only to court impermanence. Such errors fill the world, gross and deluded.

In my own past inquiries, I too traversed this path, yet how could I have known the subtle art holds a wondrous method, uniquely revealing the utmost truth? Water is lead, it is mercury—the male within Kan, its virtue residing in Ren and Gui. Refine yin to dissolve and subdue; after nine cycles of sinking and rising, the count is complete and Qian is formed, matched with metal in the western position. Though the world also employs these, they fail to grasp their origin.

Dragon and tiger possess form, hardness and softness distinguish themselves. The Metal Lord extinguishes fire; true white snow is required. The Five Movements transform and generate; fire is naturally subdued—this alone is real.

Mercury dwells within Li, obtaining the female; Li is fire, cinnabar. Attaining Ren, Gui, Bing, and Ding, it returns qi to the eastern blue yang. White concealment emerges from the center, present before one’s eyes yet difficult to perceive, obscure and indistinct, truly veiled in mist.

**Oral Instructions of Yan Junping, Thirty-Fourth**

Lead is lead, mercury is mercury—only these two are lead and mercury.
Dragon is dragon, tiger is tiger—only these two share a common ancestor.
If you can recognize this Kan and Li palace,
Beneath the Li palace, yellow earth emerges.
Yellow earth yields the yellow sprout,
Beneath the yellow sprout, golden flowers form.
When golden flowers form,
Beneath the golden flowers, purple essence congeals.
When purple essence congeals,
Beneath the purple essence, white gold appears.
White gold sinks while yellow gold floats;
The world gathers the sinking as the elixir’s head,
Seeking the red marrow to blend and sow.
There is a time for sowing, a day for harvesting,
Exchanging sinew and bone to extend lifespan—
Celestial immortals and earthly immortals beyond imagination,
Transmuting lead, iron, even tiles and shards.

One, two, three, four, five—
Water, fire, wood, metal, earth.
Simply understand this secret,
And you tread the path of longevity.

The Great Returned Elixir shines in the mirror, complete.
